# LangGraph Documentation Index

Official LangChain/LangGraph documentation URLs for web_fetch operations.

## MCP Endpoint

- MCP Server: https://docs.langchain.com/mcp

---

## Core APIs

- [Graph API Overview](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/graph-api.md): StateGraph, nodes, edges, compilation
- [Functional API Overview](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/functional-api.md): Declarative workflow definition
- [Use Graph API](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/use-graph-api.md): Practical guide for Graph API
- [Use Functional API](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/use-functional-api.md): Practical guide for Functional API
- [Choosing APIs](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/choosing-apis.md): When to use Graph vs Functional API

---

## State & Memory

- [Memory](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/add-memory.md): Adding memory to graphs
- [Persistence](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/persistence.md): Checkpointing and state persistence
- [Durable Execution](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/durable-execution.md): Reliable long-running workflows

---

## Advanced Features

- [Interrupts](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/interrupts.md): Human-in-the-loop with interrupt_before/after
- [Streaming](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/streaming.md): Real-time output streaming
- [Subgraphs](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/use-subgraphs.md): Modular graph composition
- [Time Travel](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/use-time-travel.md): Checkpoint navigation and replay

---

## LangChain Agents

- [Agents Overview](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langchain/agents.md): Building agents with LangChain
- [Tools](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langchain/tools.md): Tool definition and usage
- [Middleware Overview](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langchain/middleware/overview.md): Agent middleware patterns
- [Human-in-the-Loop](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langchain/human-in-the-loop.md): Human approval patterns
- [Structured Output](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langchain/structured-output.md): Structured response generation

---

## Multi-Agent Systems

- [Multi-Agent Overview](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langchain/multi-agent/index.md): Multi-agent architecture
- [Handoffs](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langchain/multi-agent/handoffs.md): Agent handoff patterns
- [Router](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langchain/multi-agent/router.md): Routing between agents
- [Subagents](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langchain/multi-agent/subagents.md): Subagent delegation

---

## MCP Integration

- [MCP Overview](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langchain/mcp.md): Model Context Protocol integration

---

## Model Integrations

- [Anthropic](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/integrations/providers/anthropic.md): Claude integration
- [OpenAI](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/integrations/providers/openai.md): GPT integration
- [Chat Models](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/integrations/chat/index.md): All chat model integrations

---

## Migration & Reference

- [LangGraph v1 Migration](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/migrate/langgraph-v1.md): Migration from v0.x to v1
- [LangChain v1 Migration](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/migrate/langchain-v1.md): LangChain migration guide
- [LangGraph SDK Reference](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/reference/langgraph-python.md): API reference
- [LangChain SDK Reference](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/reference/langchain-python.md): API reference

---

## Tutorials

- [Quickstart](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/quickstart.md): Getting started with LangGraph
- [Agentic RAG](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/agentic-rag.md): Build a custom RAG agent
- [SQL Agent](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/sql-agent.md): Build a custom SQL agent
- [Thinking in LangGraph](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/thinking-in-langgraph.md): Mental models for LangGraph

---

## Deployment

- [Local Server](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/local-server.md): Run LangGraph locally
- [LangSmith Studio](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/studio.md): Visual debugging
- [Deployment](https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/langgraph/deploy.md): Production deployment
